label: 他化自在天
本: The Weaving of Mantra:  Kūkai and the Construction of Esoteric Buddhist Discourse . Columbia University Press . 1999
説明文: The highest heaven in the world of desire, the lowest of the three realms (of desire, form, and formlessness) of the triple world (Skt. triloka; Jpn. sangai) (p. 247). [三界]
